Class BallEaterGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • BallEaterGame

  • public class BallEaterGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the BallEaterGame class that does the main game control for BallEater
    See Also:
    BallEater, GameArena, Ball, BallFactory

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallEaterGame

        public BallEaterGame(int level,
                     int isFast,
                     boolean isKids,
                     java.lang.String eaterColour)
        constructor, sets up the BallEater game
        Parameters:
        level, - int representing the current level
        isFast, - int level of BallEater speed (default is 0)
        isKids, - boolean is a kids level, or not
        eaterColour, - the target colour of the BallEater and target balls
